title: Sennheiser reveals Momentum True Wireless 3 earbuds with ANC and updated design
content:
Sennheiser has been a major name in the audio business for decades, and the company has offered true wireless earbuds for a while now. The Momentum True Wireless 3 was announced on Tuesday as the latest generation of Sennheiser’s wireless earbuds, with a few functional improvements and the same focus on audio quality. The new

The post Sennheiser reveals Momentum True Wireless 3 earbuds with ANC and updated design appeared first on XDA.
description: Sennheiser has officially revealed its new Momentum True Wireless 3 earbuds, which has custom 7mm German drivers and ANC support.
